description:
[Portugal, Closure and Regulation of Schools measures 2020]. 
National Commission for Access to Higher Education set from July 3rd, in the article 1 of the Act, a regulation of schools. The national final exams of secondary education carried out in the 2nd phase of exams of the academic year 2019-2020 may, exceptionally, be used as entrance exams for the 1st phase of the 2020-2021 access and admission exams for higher education:
a) By candidates for higher education who do not take the national final exams in the first stage, because they are in mandatory confinement, in a health establishment or in the respective home, because they are infected with the disease COVID 19 or because it was determined by health authority active surveillance of their situations in the context of the current pandemic.
b) By candidates for higher education who do not take the national final exams in the first phase because they have been affected by serious health reasons, including interventions surgical procedures.

through an alternative social response is not possible.

with an employment contract with a private sector employer or social, demonstrably called by the respective fire department.
